articles.title: US President Joe Biden announces nearly $US3 billion in new military aid for Ukraine - ABC News
articles.description: As the war in Ukraine drags on, US security assistance is shifting to a longer-term campaign that also will likely keep more American military troops in Europe into the future, US officials said.
